heading: 1 About
text: example documentation -text citations reference styles used Texas Water Journal submissions.

heading: 1.1 Reccomended Usage
text: Texas Water Journal uses Council Science Editors (CSE) Scientific Style Format manual, 8th edition, exceptions. Please see Texas Water Journal’s detailed style guidelines exceptions information style word usage, including punctuation, use numbers units measure, -text reference list examples. Texas Water Journal also accepts Bluebook legal articles.

heading: 1.1.1 In-Text References
text:
Texas Water Journal uses Name–Year -text reference system, meaning basic form Author Last Name Year; two authors, use First Author Last Name Second Author Last Name Year; two use First Author Last Name et al. Year; organization, use Organization Initials Year.Examples:
Smith 2013
Smith Jones 2013
Smith et al. 2013
EPA 2013When several -text references occur point, give chronologic sequence earliest latest, separated semicolons (see CSE Section 29.2.1.2.9. references published year, list alphabetical order.Example:
Improved estimates climate variability trends prepare authorities cope ongoing climate change, predicted increase aridity Southwest (IPCC 2007b; Seager et al. 2008; Banner et al. 2010) may help prepare mitigation strategies (IPCC 2007a; Furniss et al. 2010).

heading: 1.1.2 References: Reference List
text:
-text citations reference lists, see CSE Chapter 29.Components end references sequenceAll references internet include date accessed. inclusion 
URL reference online source makes medium obvious, necessary 
include “Internet” medium designator online sources.basic format journal article :
Last Name Initials (periods), Last Name Initials. Year. Title article (sentence
case). Journal Title (spelled , italics). (period) Vol (issue):page numbers
(separated hyphen). Available : DOI link.Use sentence case journal articles, book titles (capitalization follow format 
normal sentence).abbreviate journal titles.order format personal author names, follow examples:Vincent T. DeVita, Jr. → DeVita VT Jr
John . Addams III → Adams JA 3rd
Estelle Palmer-Canton → Palmer-Canton E
Jean-Louis Lagrot → Lagrot JL

heading: 1.2 Bibliography Managers
text: multiple bibliography managers available manage format references. Zotero Mendeley use Citation Style Language (.csl) files format references. .csl file specific texas Water Jounral’s -house reference style available Github.

heading: 2 Reports
text: Last Name, First Name initial, Last Name, First Name Initial. Year. Report title Title Case, Publisher/Organization. Identifying information. URL.

heading: 2.1 Examples
text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua (Borel et al. 2012).Borel et al. (2012) vitae aliquet nec ullamcorper sit amet risus nullam eget

heading: 3 Journals
text: Last name, First initial Middle initial. Year. Article title sentence case. Journal Title. Volume (issue): page numbers. URL (use DOI possible).

heading: 3.1 Examples
text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua (Wagner et al. 2012). Byers et al. (2005) mattis vulputate enim nulla aliquet porttitor lacus.

heading: 4 News and Magazine Articles
text: Last name, First name. Year. Title sentence case. Newspaper/Magazine, Date published. URL.

heading: 4.1 Examples
text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua (Schlanger 2018 Aug 20).

heading: 5 Websites
text: Name/organization. Year. Website title Title Case. URL.

heading: 6.1 Complete Books
text: Name/organization. Year. Website title Title Case. URL.

heading: 6.2 Chapter or parts of books
text: Last name, First initial Middle initial. Year. Title chapter/section sentence case. Title book Title Case, edited First initial Middle initial Last name First initial Middle initial Last name, pages. Publisher information. URL.

heading: 6.3 Examples
text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua (James et al. 2013). Helsel et al. (2020) mauris cursus mattis molestie iaculis .Tempus urna et pharetra pharetra massa. Arcu cursus euismod quis viverra. Id interdum velit laoreet id donec (Grant et al. 2013).

heading: 7.1 Thesis
text: (Fouad 2016; Kip 2016)

heading: 7.2 Software
text: (Padfield Matheson 2020; R Core Team 2021)

heading: 7.3 Online Data
text: (Schramm 2020 Dec 11)

heading: 7.4 Conference Papers
text: (Lee et al. 2003)

heading: 8.1 Public Law
text: (Preventive… 1993)

heading: 8.2 Unenacted Bills
text: (Medical… 1995)Example citing Texas state bill, opposed federal bill:(H.B. 3298 2015)
